I cannot say enough great things about Splash Pools DFW—they were better than awesome! From start to finish, their professionalism (Josh Curry & Josh Howard) and commitment to quality were unmatched. They were always available to answer any questions, no matter how big or small, and their communication made the entire process stress-free. The crew was on site daily, working hard and keeping us updated every step of the way. The attention to detail and pride in their work truly shows in the finis

We had an incredible experience working with Josh Curry and Splash Pools, and I can’t recommend them enough. From start to finish, the entire process took less than six weeks, and not once did we feel like we were left waiting or wondering what was next.

Josh Curry is a second-generation pool builder, and it shows in everything he does. This isn’t your typical run-of-the-mill pool company. He brings deep knowledge, professionalism, and a no-pressure approach that makes a big difference. He cons

We have absolutely loved our process with Josh and his amazing crews. One of my biggest dreams was having a pool. Josh was wonderful to work with and both our vision and his came together beautifully. We look forward to our phase 2 built later this year as we continue to make our homestead an oasis retreat. You can say it's both human and dog approved. Your in amazing hands!
